SEARCH
Package com.app.service.impl.crud

Class GenericServiceImpl<T,U>

java.lang.Object
com.app.service.impl.crud.GenericServiceImpl<T,U>
Type Parameters:
T - the entity type, which corresponds to the persistence model (e.g., entity)
U - the model type, which corresponds to the service or DTO model (e.g., business model)
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudService<U>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientServiceImpl, OrderServiceImpl, ProductServiceImpl
public abstract class GenericServiceImpl<T,U> extends Object implements CrudService<U>
A generic implementation of the CrudService interface providing basic CRUD operations for entities of type GenericServiceImpl and model type GenericServiceImpl.

This class provides common functionality for retrieving, deleting, and converting entities from the repository. Subclasses can extend this class to customize or extend the behavior for specific entity types.

      public U findById(Long id)
      Finds an entity by its ID and converts it to the model type.

      If the entity is not found, an EntityNotFoundException is thrown.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the converted model GenericServiceImpl
      Throws:

    • findAllByIds

      public List<U> findAllByIds(List<Long> ids)
      Finds entities by their IDs and converts them to the model type.

      If some entities are not found, an EntityNotFoundException is thrown.

      Specified by:
      findAllByIds in interface CrudService<T>
      Parameters:
      ids - the list of IDs of entities to find
      Returns:
      a list of converted models GenericServiceImpl
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if not all entities are found

    • removeElement

      public Long removeElement(Long id)
      Removes an entity by its ID.

      If the entity is found, it is deleted from the repository, and its ID is returned.

      Specified by:
      removeElement in interface CrudService<T>
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the entity to remove
      Returns:
      the ID of the removed entity
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if the entity with the specified ID is not found

    • removeAllByIds

      public List<Long> removeAllByIds(List<Long> ids)
      Removes multiple entities by their IDs.

      Finds the entities corresponding to the provided IDs, deletes them from the repository, and returns the list of IDs. If any entity is not found, an EntityNotFoundException is thrown.

      Specified by:
      removeAllByIds in interface CrudService<T>
      Parameters:
      ids - the list of IDs of the entities to remove
      Returns:
      a list of IDs of the removed entities
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if not all entities are found
